title: ForgeCoherenceGraph
description: JSON Schema for CC-Forge coherence registry files (project-graph.json, global-graph.json). Enforces entity kinds and relationship types to prevent drift in registry nomenclature across sessions.

version.description: Schema version of this registry file

last_updated.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of last update, or null if never written

description.description: Optional human-readable description of this registry

entities.description: Inventory of known system entities in this scope

kind.description: Entity classification. 'service' = any running process. 'database' = any data store. 'k8s_resource' = a Kubernetes object. 'api_endpoint' = a specific HTTP route. 'ui_component' = a frontend component. 'secret' = a credentials store. 'configmap' = a config store. 'pipeline_stage' = a CI/CD step. 'library' = a shared internal package. 'external_service' = a third-party dependency.

path.description: Repo-relative path to the entity's primary artifact (e.g. services/auth-api, deploy/helm/auth)

metadata.description: Arbitrary key-value pairs for entity-specific context (language, framework, namespace, etc.)

relationships.description: Directed edges between entities describing how they interact

from.description: ID of the source entity (must match an entity id in this registry)

to.description: ID of the target entity (must match an entity id in this registry)

type.description: Relationship type. reads-from/writes-to: data flow. depends-on: runtime dependency. authenticates-via: auth delegation. deployed-by: CI/CD relationship. tested-by: test coverage. exposes: API surface. routes-to: ingress/gateway routing. configures: config management.

metadata.description: Arbitrary key-value pairs for relationship context (e.g. protocol, port, read-only flag)
